question2-1

package pack1;
public  class Question2_1 {
 int a=10;
 protected Question2_1()
 {
  System.out.println("constructor of super class is running");
 }
 
}

question2-2

import pack1.Question2_1;
public class Question2_2 extends Question2_1 {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  // TODO Auto-generated method stub
  Question2_2 ob=new Question2_2();
  
 }
}
